service_k8s_cluster_ha.description: High Availability (HA) configuration for Kubernetes (K8s) service clusters. Service K8s clusters are supported only in HA mode.

cluster_name.description: Required. Name of the Kubernetes service cluster. Must match the service cluster name defined elsewhere.

enable_k8s_ha.description: Mandatory. Must be true. Service Kubernetes cluster deployment is supported only in HA mode.

virtual_ip_address.description: Mandatory. Virtual IP address used as the Kubernetes API endpoint for the service cluster setup.
